Text: Cid... Cid! Why are you running away?!

Your sister is here to see you! Why on earth are you
running!

Eyes blazing, Rose and Claire kick their pursuit
of Cid into high gear.

A confrontation with the two bitter rivals is more
than he can handle right now. This is his only
chance to escape.

If he wanted to, he could easily lose them both,
but the two women have no idea that his status
as a side character will not allow it.
Hey, Cid! Are you listening to me!

I can hear you...but I'm not sure I feel like
sticking around for what you have planned...!

Cid, please! I have something I need to talk to you
about! Please listen to me!

I don't know what you're going on about, but it makes
me want to keep running even more!

Huff...huff... He is always so...abnormally fast at
running...away...!

Not...not surprised... This...reminds me of...his
deter...determination at the Bushin Festival...
Now is not the time...to take it easy...!

(...I wonder if I should say the same, that I am up
to the challenge. I feel like her spirit is so much
like Cid's somehow.)

She must be disguising her true intentions to keep
pursuing him so earnestly.

If he manages to evade me today, I won't be able
to hang out with him for a while...!
What?!
Rose can't believe what she is hearing.
Hang out...? Did you just say hang out?!
...What? What's wrong with that?

You're so desperate to hang out that you're willing
to chase him across campus?!
Please yield his time to me!

Later I'll be too busy with my own student council
tasks. By then it will be too late...! I need to talk to
him today no matter what!

Princess, don't be selfish. Today is also my only
chance.

Starting tomorrow, I'll be working nonstop at the
Crimson Order.

You can spend all the time you want with him in the
future! You are family, after all...

Today is literally the only day I can hang out
with Cid!

(...Oh! This is what it is to be family⁠—to be loved
by Claire Kagenou...!)

(No, Rose. What do you do when there is pressure?
I... I will not lose to anyone else when it comes to
loving Cid.)

(However, if I keep fighting with Claire like this,
I won't win. So...)
Claire, I have a suggestion.
A suggestion...?

Both of us have the same goal—Cid. However, there is
no meaning to us fighting if he is not actually with nus.
Let us join forces so that we can capture him.
...A temporary ceasefire. I can work with that.
Thank you, Claire.
I am not doing this for you. Remember that.
Meanwhile, Cid is hiding somewhere...
They won't find me here.
Maybe I should take a nap⁠—huh?

No, they couldn't have... Urgh, and I thought no one
knew about this classroom at the edge of campus.
Cid, where are you? Please come out.
...Don't worry, Claire isn't with me.

I...just have a few things I need to let you know.
It will be quick. I promise. Please come out.

(He seems to be on alert. He is good at hide-and-seek
just like Claire said. So for my next tactic...)

Actually...Claire seems to have gone back to your
dorm room...
What...?!

She said, "If I can't catch Cid, then I might as well
 nose through his stuff."
Jeez!  boundaries!
Ah... Cid! Finally, there you are!
Sorry, but I've got some urgent business!

In a similar manner to when he escaped earlier, Cid
bursts out the window of the gloomy classroom and
dashes outside. But awaiting him is...
I am not letting you get away.
S-Sis...! Wh-Why are you here...
Sorry, Cid, but this is for your own good...!

Argh... You lured me out with such a beginner
move...!

I thought there'd be no one here. It's the perfect
place to hide away... Argh!

Heheh. I already know every single place you could
even dream of hiding in!
Whaaaa?!

I see! You like these kinds of dark places, Cid!
I guess it is a really good spot for relaxing.

But... there's so much dust in those old classrooms!
Most of them haven't been used in ages, so it might
not be healthy spending time in there...

Oh, I know! Next time, if you want to be alone,
please come to my room!
But then I wouldn't be alone...

Don't worry, I won't bother you. You can think of me
as being like a cushion, you can rest your head
against me without any hesitation!

Actually, you can come to my room right now! I can
make some top class tea to help you relax!
Erm, no thanks...

Hey, keep your distance from him! My Cid is not going
to a girl's room so easily! Cid, maybe you should come
to my room!
Erm, no thanks to that too...!

Anyway, what do you mean your room? You said it was
official student council business!

Claire, don't you think you're a little too attached?
I must confess that this is a bit much for siblings!
Is there something wrong with siblings that get along?
Whoa! Hey, don't pull on me...!

There is! As his school friend, I have a right to be
with him!
Huh? You're gonna pull me that way now...?!
Um, I think my clothes are going to rip apart...
Cid! Who do you want to be with?!
Say it clearly!

Errr... Fine. The three of us! The three of us will
go out...! That's fine, isn't it?
The...three...of...us?

(...This is quite honestly a complication. But I
don't want to stay stubborn and dismiss Cid's
thoughtful suggestion off-handedly.)
...Okay. I accept Cid's offer!

Fine... If that's what Cid wants, then it's the
three of us!

You two are talking like this is what I want, but
isn't there something clearly wrong with this
situation?!
